title: 2005년 Calpine Producer Services v. Wiser Oil Co. 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Calpine Producer Services v. Wiser Oil Co.. 판결일: 2005-08-17. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: CALPINE PRODUCER SERVICES, L.P., Appellant v. the WISER OIL COMPANY, Appellee
**판결일**: 2005-08-17
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Justices Wright, Moseley and Lang

## 변호인

J. Robert Beatty and Cynthia Keely Timms, Locke, Liddell & Sapp, L.L.P., Dallas, for Appellant., D. Ronald Reneker, John L. Thompson, Craddock, Reneker, Davis LLP, and Craig A. Haynes, Thompson & Knight, P.C., Dallas, for Appellee.

## 인용

- 169 S.W.3d 783

## 판결문 요약


169 S.W.3d 783 (2005)
CALPINE PRODUCER SERVICES, L.P., Appellant
v.
The WISER OIL COMPANY, Appellee.
No. 05-04-01025-CV.
Court of Appeals of Texas, Dallas.
August 17, 2005.
*784 J. Robert Beatty and Cynthia Keely Timms, Locke, Liddell & Sapp, L.L.P., Dallas, for Appellant.
D. Ronald Reneker, John L. Thompson, Craddock, Reneker, Davis LLP, and Craig A. Haynes, Thompson & Knight, P.C., Dallas, for Appellee.
Before Justices WRIGHT, MOSELEY and LANG.

OPINION
Opinion by Justice LANG.
Calpine appeals a summary judgment awarding Wiser damages for natural gas purchased by Calpine under a "Gas Sales and Purchase Agreement." Pursuant to the agreement, Calpine purchased natural gas, "from time-to-time," from Wiser, the producer. Then, Calpine resold the natural gas. The trial court's decision assessing liability and damages was on consideration of cross motions for summary judgment, with many facts being stipulated. The parties agree that the agreement is unambiguous.
In two issues, Calpine asserts that the trial court erred in deciding against Calpine and in favor of Wiser. We decide in Calpine's favor on both issues. Therefore, we reverse and render judgment that Wiser take nothing on its claim against Calpine.

I. Factual Context and Procedural History
The subject of this action is the interpretation of a "Gas Sales and Purchase Agreement" dated September 1, 1997, between Wiser, as Seller, and Calpine, then known as Highland Energy Company, as Buyer. Pursuant to the agreeme...
